command.conversion.title: Korean <-> English Conversion
command.korean.title: Convert English to Korean
command.english.title: Convert Korean to English
configuration.title: Korean-English Conversion
configuration.command.menu.korean: Added English->Korean conversion function to menu.
configuration.command.menu.english: Added Korean->English conversion function to menu.
configuration.command.action.display: Display conversion functions in code actions. (Apply on restart)
configuration.command.action.preview: Pre-mark what will be converted into a code action.
configuration.command.action.korean: Added English->Korean conversion function to code action. (Apply on restart)
configuration.command.action.english: Added Korean->English conversion function to code action. (Apply on restart)
configuration.command.language.target:
Select the language you want to convert to the default commands. 
Commands that perform the same function may appear as **duplicate** if you select the Show More option from a menu or code action.
configuration.command.language.target.al: In the selected part, English is converted to Korean and Korean is converted to English
configuration.command.language.target.en: In the selected part, Only Korean is converted to English
configuration.command.language.target.ko: In the selected part, Only English is converted to Korean
